summary:
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:  
Ankush Singh is a computer science student with hands-on experience as a Software Developer Intern at CHARM AI Technologies and Frontend Intern at AERIUS LABS. He specializes in full-stack development, AI-driven applications, and cloud-based solutions, demonstrating strong technical expertise and problem-solving abilities. His academic background includes a BTech in CSE from Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology with a high CGPA.  

KEY SKILLS:  
Ankush possesses a diverse skill set spanning frontend development with React JS, Next.js, and Three.js, backend development using Node.js, Express, and NestJS, and cloud services like AWS and Docker. He is proficient in databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Firebase, along with tools like Git, Postman, and CI/CD pipelines. His programming expertise includes JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and Java, complemented by strong problem-solving and leadership skills.  

EXPERIENCE HIGHLIGHTS:  
As a Software Developer Intern at CHARM AI Technologies, he developed RAG-based AI chat agents and automated document pipelines using OpenAI APIs and Azure Cognitive Services. At AERIUS LABS, he built interactive 3D web applications with Next.js and Three.js, enhancing UI fluidity through advanced animation techniques. He also contributed to backend improvements for a banking client using Python and AWS Lambda.  

EDUCATION:  
BTech in Computer Science and Engineering from Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology, Delhi, with a CGPA of 8.8 (2021-2025). He completed XII (PCM) from Aligarh Muslim University with 86.80%.  

CAREER LEVEL:  
Entry-level, with internship experience and academic projects demonstrating foundational expertise in software development.
